name: Escape The Loop (itch) (Embrace The Code)
description:
Puzzle Platformer with Time Loop mechanics. 

Be your own ally and enemy at the same time, while helping a mad scientist escape from the time prison. 

Made in 72 hours for the "GGJREGIO 2022".

Controls:

[W] [A] [S] [D] -> move

[space bar] -> jump

[1] -> toggle invincibility (for extra fun)

[2] -> toggle bloom
